title: Poached megrim sole, seaweed butter sauce, warm quinoa and sea herb salad
description: Megrim sole is abundant in British seas and is less expensive than its cousins Dover and lemon sole. Served here with a sea herb salad, it’s the perfect dish to make the most your seaside foraging bounty.
ingredients: 2 x megrim sole, skinned with head and tail removed
20g/½oz dashi powder (available in Japanese grocers and online)
salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 plum tomato, skinned and finely chopped
1 lemon, peeled, segmented and finely chopped
¼ cucumber, peeled and finely chopped
